item.title: Zune 80GB now available at Zune Originals
item.description: Customize your Zune player with laser-engraved designs and personal text through a new Web store called Zune Originals.

item.title: You make it you.
item.description: New Zune players, re-designed Zune software and new online services including the Zune Marketplace and the Zune Social, an online music community.
